name: Stevenson Mariano
description:
Hi,
Life has never been so borring than these few years where i have noticed that life is better lived while being two. Am Stevenson Mariano, young man of 57 living all alone and wishing to share the rest of my life with someone who shares my point of view about life being borring while lived alone.
I have so much to share and am looking for a partner who will be willing to join hands with me so that we can breakthrough the rest of our days together. Am jovial, simple, sincere and very friendly. I hate lies, selfishness and pride. Simplicity is the rulf nowadays game so why not being simple and make the best of our remaining life time?
